oai_dc:dc.dc:title: 7-inch Dyer shell fired from a Federal columbiad at Island No. 10
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Federal columbiad guns mounted on tinclads probably fired this 7-inch Dyer shell at Confederate fortifications on Island No. 10. The island surrendered to Gen. John Pope on April 8, 1862. The shell is on permanent exhibit at the Carnegie Center in Jackson, Tenn.
